expo.name: Moudak
expo.description: Moudak Beta, is your digital printer itâ€™s an application where you order anything you need printing starting from paper to custom gifts. Our process is simple just download the application & order through our instant printing (Flyers, Brochures, Assignment) or through our Custom Printings (Wrist Bands, Banners, Keychains). Get your order delivered right to your doorstep.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos, so that we can print these photos and deliver them to the user.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs to access to save photos, so that the user can upload them then we can print them and deliver them to the user.
infoPlist.PhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs to access photos, so that the user can upload them, so that we can print them and deliver them to the user.
